nameOverride.description: Override the default name of traefik-ingress

fullnameOverride.description: Unique name to override the generated one

logLevel.description: The log level for traefik executable

tlsOption.description: The default TLSOption attached to the websecure entrypoint

tlsStrictSni.description: Select if the default TLSOptions has strict sni enabled

podSecurityPolicyEnabled.description: Enable the Pod Security Policy for allowing the execution of the traefik pods

minAvailable.description: Number of pods from that set that must still be available after the eviction

maxUnavailable.description: Number of pods from that set that can be unavailable after the eviction

defaultIngressClass.description: Set as default ingressClass of the cluster, setting it up only in kubernetes >= 1.18 and if the traefik version is >= 2.3

allowCrossNamespaceResources.description: Enable the definition of the kubernetes resources outside the one where Traefik is deployed

allowExternalNameServices.description: Enable the usage of ExternalName services

replicas.description: The number of replicas for the deployment

annotations.description: Custom annotations to add to the deployment

imagePullSecrets.description: Name of kuberntes secrets to use for repository authentication

nodeSelectors.description: Node selectors to add to the deployment

tolerations.description: Tolerations to add to the deployment

enableTLS.description: Enable websecure entrypoint and default redirect to https

annotations.description: Custom annotations to add to the public service

loadBalancerIP.description: The IP that will be exposed from the loadbalancer attached to the service

externalIPs.description: The IPs of the external loadbalancer

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: The ip ranges that are allowed to call the loadbalancer

annotations.description: Custom annotations to add to the rbac resources
